#NookNotes:

- 2023 NCAA Rifle Champion

- CRCA Scholastic All-American (2021-22, 22-23)

- CRCA Rookie of the Year (2021-22)

- CRCA Aggregate All-American Second Team (2021-22, 2022-23)

- CRCA Aggregate All-American Third Team (2023-24)

- CRCA Smallbore First Team All-American (2021-22, 2022-23)

- CRCA Smallbore Second Team All-American (2023-24)

- CRCA Air Rifle Second Team All-American (2021-22, 2022-23)

- CRCA Air Rifle Second Team All-American (2023-24)

2023-24 | Junior

In her junior season, Karasová shot in all 12 matches for the Nanooks ... She began her season with aggregate scores of 1184 and 1187 in the Nanooks wins over Ohio State ... At the 2024 NCAA Rifle Championships in Morgantown, W.Va., she posted a new career-high aggregate score of 1189 with a 593 in smallbore and 596 in air rifle ... Her 593 score in smallbore earned her a trip to the individual smallbore finals ... She took eighth ... She shot a season-high 593 in smallbore two separate times ... On Dec. 6, 2023 at Air Force, she shot a new career-high in air rifle with a 599 ... She finished with three 590+ smallbore scores on the season ... Karasová fired a 595+ in air rifle in eight of 12 matches this season ... Named a CRCA All-American in all three categories ... Named CRCA Aggregate Third Team All-American, CRCA Smallbore Second Team All-American and CRCA Air Rifle Second Team All-American

2022-23 | Sophomore

As a sophomore, Karasová shot in 13 matches for the Nanooks ... She shot a season-high 594 in smallbore on two separate occassions, the last coming on Nov. 2, 2022 at The Citadel ... She tied her career-high in aggregate scoring with an 1188 that same match after posting a 594 in air rifle ... She matched her career-high in air rifle in her last match of the season with a 597 against UTEP in the Nanooks' 2023 NCAA Qualifying match ... In that match, she posted an aggregate of 1182, giving her nine matches with an aggregate of 1180+ ... NCAA Champion ... Earned CRCA All-American honors in aggregate, smallbore and air rifle ... CRCA Scholastic All-American

2021-22 | Freshman

As a freshman, Karasová shot in 14 matches for the Nanooks ... She shot a career-high 596 in smallbore on Jan. 16, 2022 against Ole Miss ... In air rifle, Karasová posted a score of 596 on four separate occassions and posted a career-high 597 on Jan. 23, 2022 in Fairbanks against Air Force ... Her aggregate career-high came on Jan. 23, 2022 against the Air Force Academy as well, that same day as her 597 in air, she posted a 591 in smallbore to post a best aggregate of 1188 ... With her average of 589 in smallbore and 593.92 in air rifle, Karasová earned CRCA Rookie Shooter of the Year honors ... She also earned CRCA All-American honors in smallbore (First Team), air rifle (Second Team) and aggregate (Second Team) ... CRCA Scholastic All-American

Prior to Alaska

Maticni Gymnazium Ostrava

Went to Maticni Gymnazium Ostrava while shooting for SSK Olymp Ostrava ... Is a National Champion and European Champion

Personal

Daughter of Antonin Karas and Jana Karasová ... Two siblings; Natalie and Antonin ... Studying Security and Disaster Management
